description:
Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil - N 06 - Green is a luxurious makeup essential designed to create stunning, professional-looking smokey eye effects with minimal effort. This versatile eye pencil delivers rich, vibrant green pigmentation that glides on smoothly for precise application and exceptional color payoff. Perfect for creating both subtle daytime looks and dramatic evening styles, this pencil is a must-have addition to your makeup collection. 💄✨

Product Information

Color N 06 - Green (Deep emerald shade)
Material Creamy velvet formula
Size Standard eye pencil size
Brand Topface

Key Features of the Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil

  • Velvety Smooth Texture: Glides effortlessly across the eyelid without tugging or pulling
  • Intense Green Pigmentation: Delivers bold, vibrant color that complements all eye colors
  • Blendable Formula: Easy to smudge for creating the perfect smokey effect
  • Long-Lasting Wear: Stays put throughout the day without smudging or fading
  • Built-in Smudger: Includes a convenient tool for blending and creating smokey effects

Benefits of Using Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil in Green

The rich emerald green shade of this smokey eye pencil makes it particularly flattering for enhancing brown, hazel, and blue eyes. The color adds depth and dimension while making your eye color pop dramatically. 👁️ The creamy formula is infused with nourishing ingredients that prevent the delicate eye area from drying out during wear.

Looking for more makeup options? Check out our complete makeup collection for complementary products to create your perfect look.

How to Create the Perfect Smokey Eye with Your Green Eye Pencil

  1. Apply the pencil along your upper and lower lash lines
  2. Use the built-in smudger to blend the color upward on the lid
  3. Layer for more intensity or keep it light for a subtle daytime look
  4. Pair with mascara to complete your eye makeup look

For a complete makeup routine, explore our fragrance collection to find the perfect scent to complement your look. You might also enjoy our international fragrances for a touch of luxury.

Frequently Asked Question: Can I use the Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil on my waterline?

Yes! The Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil - N 06 - Green is ophthalmologically tested and safe to use on the waterline. The creamy formula is gentle enough for this sensitive area while still providing excellent color payoff and staying power. For best results on the waterline, allow the pencil to set for 30 seconds after application to prevent smudging. 💯

Complete your eye makeup collection with our eyeshadow palettes and mascaras for endless creative possibilities. For a bold look, pair this green eye pencil with our volumizing mascara for dramatic, attention-grabbing eyes.

Elevate your makeup routine with the Velvet Smokey Eye Pencil - N 06 - Green and discover why it's becoming a favorite among makeup enthusiasts and professionals alike!
